com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.util.Wrapper<Status>
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Status

    public class StdStatus
extends Wrapper<Status>
implements Status
    Immutable implementation of the Status interface.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Status STATUS_OK 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdStatus(Status status)
      Creates a new immutable StdStatus that wraps the given Status.
      StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn)
      Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, a null status message and no StatusDetail.
      StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn, java.lang.String statusMessageIn)
      Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, String status message and no StatusDetail.
      StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn, java.lang.String statusMessageIn, StatusDetail statusDetailIn)
      Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, String status message, and StatusDetail.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StdStatus copy(Status status)
      Creates a new StdStatus that is a copy of the given Status.
      StatusCode getStatusCode()
      Gets the StatusCode for this Status.
      StatusDetail getStatusDetail()
      Gets the StatusDetail associated with this Status if there is any.
      java.lang.String getStatusMessage()
      Gets the String status message for this Status.
      boolean isOk()
      Returns true if the StatusCode for this Status is the XACML OK value.
      Status merge(Status status)
      Returns a Status with the same StatusCode and status message as this Status but whose StatusDetail is the merging of the StatusDetail in this Status and the StatusDetail in the given Status.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StdStatus

        public StdStatus(Status status)
        Creates a new immutable StdStatus that wraps the given Status. The caller agrees not to modify the given Status as long as the new StdStatus refers to it.
        Parameters:
        status - the Status to wrap

      • StdStatus

        public StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn,
         java.lang.String statusMessageIn,
         StatusDetail statusDetailIn)
        Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, String status message, and StatusDetail.
        Parameters:
        statusCodeIn - the StatusCode representing the XACML StatusCode.
        statusMessageIn - the String representing the XACML StatusMessage
        statusDetailIn - the StatusDetail representing the XACML StatusDetail

      • StdStatus

        public StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn,
         java.lang.String statusMessageIn)
        Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, String status message and no StatusDetail.
        Parameters:
        statusCodeIn - the StatusCode representing the XACML StatusCode.
        statusMessageIn - the String representing the XACML StatusMessage

      • StdStatus

        public StdStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn)
        Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, a null status message and no StatusDetail.
        Parameters:
        statusCodeIn - the StatusCode representing the XACML StatusCode.

      • merge

        public Status merge(Status status)
        Description copied from interface: Status
